title: Zuri Hall Interview and more
itunes:title: Zuri Hall Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had the gang all here. Dj Envy, Angela Yee and Charlamagne who is here to stay! Moreover, we had Tamala Payne tell her story on her son Casey Goodson's killing by veteran SWAT Officer. We also had Zuri Hall call in to speak on her new podcast "Hot Happy Mess" on the Black Effect Network. Charlamagne also nominated Staten Island locals activist for taking offense to Pete Davidson for outing bar that refuses to close amid pandemic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had the gang all here. Dj Envy, Angela Yee and Charlamagne who is here to stay! Moreover, we had Tamala Payne tell her story on her son Casey Goodson's killing by veteran SWAT Officer. We also had Zuri Hall call in to speak on her new podcast "Hot Happy Mess" on the Black Effect Network. Charlamagne also nominated Staten Island locals activist for taking offense to Pete Davidson for outing bar that refuses to close amid pandemic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
